shows.title: Family Boogie
shows.desc:
Get the whole family dancing like you do in the kitchen! Featuring fun props and vibrant dance routines to brilliant music, from the golden decades of soul and disco to the colourful 80s and 90s to today.

Kitchen Dancing founder Jo Porter teaches fun, music themed dance-fitness classes to all ages in her home town of Nottingham.
